content: this unique beanie is crocheted in caron simply soft yarn great for intermediate crocheters this amazing hat features the star cluster stitch this stitch is extremely popular and now you have have this same stitch in a hat the brim is made up of slip_stitch row the slip stitching provides incredible elasticity and gives the look of knitting but with the luxury of using your crochet hook instead fun tip personalize your beanie by making a yarn pompom in any color you choose or top with a faux fur pompom by bernat
